mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reviews (user_id, article_id, content, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{userId}, #{articleId}, #{content}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT r.review_id AS reviewId, r.user_id AS userId, r.article_id AS articleId, u.nickname AS writerNickName, u.role AS userRole, r.content AS content, r.created_at AS createdAt, r.updated_at AS updatedAt FROM reviews r JOIN users u ON r.user_id = u.user_id WHERE r.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY r.created_at DESC
